products.title: Veil Pebble Voile Roller Blind
products.description: The veil pebble voile blind has a destinctive grey tone and stripe running down the fabric which is a plain smooth finish. This is perfect for giving your home privacy in a stylish and minamalistic way. Pair alongside wooden blinds or roller blinds to create the ultimate light control in your window. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Amor White Lotus With Haze Soft Grey Double Roller Blind
products.description: Combining two of their most popular roller blinds in one, this amor white lotus and haze soft grey double roller blind gives you the best of both worlds. Keep the voile down in the day for light and privacy, then at night lower the blackout amor soft grey to block out the light. Their double roller blinds give you total control and practicality, with both blinds installed on the same bracket you won't need to worry about installing twice.

products.title: Disney Princess Roller Blind
products.description: Liven up your childs bedroom with one of their disney roller blinds, 100% blackout to help ensure a great nights sleep, and in a range of clasic prints that'll help make bedtime something to look forward to. As standard all of their blinds are child safe coming with a clear clip to hold the chain taught and agaisnt the wall so there are no free-hanging cords. Being a blackout fabric makes this blind perfect for bedrooms where you need darkness to help give your child the best night sleep possible.
